description:
Free Media Player for Windows and Linux with Youtube support.

SMPlayer is a free media player for Windows and Linux with built-in codecs that can play virtually all video and audio formats.
It doesn't need any external codecs.
Just install SMPlayer and you'll be able to play all formats without the hassle to find and install codec packs."
[24.05] - 2024-05-13
- Bug fixes.
- The Windows portable version now saves the configuration files in
the folder "config".
